Name: Bomb Bomb! My Friends
About the game: Test your operational ability, sense of space and ability to aim. 'Bomb Bomb! My Friends' is a 3D physical party game. In this game, you and your friends throw bombs to each other, and avoid the collapsing floors. The last player to fall will win. You can build your own levels and play with friends. Upload your levels to the Internet, or play levels designed by other players. Features Cute cube style Online play for up to 2~8 players Single Challenge Mode, Challenge Your Limits Level Editor Share your level on the internet More than 10 characters and 40 components Various weather effects
Publishers: Burp Mimic,No Stuck Game Studio,Light of Creators
